languages.text: "Как и все здесь. Нет, его грех заключается в другом — он перешел дорогу мне. Насчет предательств и убийств у меня претензий нет".
"Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."
languages.original_text: "Как и все здесь. Нет, его грех заключается в другом — он перешел дорогу мне. Насчет предательств и убийств у меня претензий нет".

traits.locale_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."

languages.text: “这里的其他人也都是这样。不，他的罪行不是这个，而是他妨碍了我。至于背叛和杀人什么的，我觉得没什么大不了。”
languages.original_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."

traits.locale_text: “这里的其他人也都是这样。不，他的罪行不是这个，而是他妨碍了我。至于背叛和杀人什么的，我觉得没什么大不了。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Como todos aquí. No, su verdadero crimen fue interponerse en mi camino. En cuanto a la traición y los asesinatos, no me quejo».
languages.original_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."

traits.locale_text: «Como todos aquí. No, su verdadero crimen fue interponerse en mi camino. En cuanto a la traición y los asesinatos, no me quejo».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「ここにいるすべての者たちも同じだ。奴の罪は別にある――私の邪魔をしたのだ。裏切りと殺人に関しては特に問題視していない」
languages.original_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."

traits.locale_text: 「ここにいるすべての者たちも同じだ。奴の罪は別にある――私の邪魔をしたのだ。裏切りと殺人に関しては特に問題視していない」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Wie alle anderen hier. Nein, sein Verbrechen war ein anderes. Er ist mir in die Quere gekommen. Was den Verrat und das Morden angeht, da habe ich keine Beschwerden."
languages.original_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."

traits.locale_text: "Wie alle anderen hier. Nein, sein Verbrechen war ein anderes. Er ist mir in die Quere gekommen. Was den Verrat und das Morden angeht, da habe ich keine Beschwerden."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Comme tout le monde ici. Non, son crime était tout autre : il s'est mis en travers de mon chemin. Quant à la trahison et au meurtre... ça ne me dérange pas. »
languages.original_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."

traits.locale_text: « Comme tout le monde ici. Non, son crime était tout autre : il s'est mis en travers de mon chemin. Quant à la trahison et au meurtre... ça ne me dérange pas. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Burada herkes öyle. Yok, onun suçu başkaydı. Yoluma çıktı. Hainliğine ve katilliğine diyecek bir şeyim yok."
languages.original_text: "Like everyone else here. No, his crime was something else — he got in my way. As for the treachery and killing, I have no complaints."

traits.locale_text: "Burada herkes öyle. Yok, onun suçu başkaydı. Yoluma çıktı. Hainliğine ve katilliğine diyecek bir şeyim yok."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
